<!-- Brief description of your change -->

## Checklist

### For new tool entries

- [ ] One tool per PR
- [ ] Tool has a working public repository
- [ ] Actively maintained (commits within the last 2 years)
- [ ] Entry follows the format in CONTRIBUTING.md
- [ ] Word limits respected (15/75/25/20)
- [ ] Placed alphabetically in the list
- [ ] All links verified working
- [ ] Screenshot uses official project assets (if included)
- [ ] Commit message follows format: `feat: add toolname entry`

### For fixes and updates

- [ ] Commit message follows format: `fix: description` or `docs: description`
- [ ] Changes are accurate and verified

**How did you discover this tool?** (Optional, but we're curious)
